title: 820-2879-B No wifi
message:
I have runned ASD and there were no problems with that. Have tried other lcd and still no wifi. Installed new OS X and still nothing. 

What should i check?

title: 820-2879-B No wifi
message: Check if L3404 is fried. If it is then the APX card was plugged in wrong way around or the cable is shorted. Could also be a fucked up connector.

title: 820-2879-B No wifi
message: Also the connector is good. Tested with another macbook and works fine.

title: 820-2879-B No wifi
message:
You tested the connector on the board....
Got 5V on L3404? Check continuity from pin 1,2,4,5,7,8,10,11,12 to the connector on the APX card.

title: 820-2879-B No wifi
message:
Yes i got 5V on L3404. 

Pin 1 0.378
Pin 2  0.377
Pin 4 0.455
Pin 5 0.455
Pin 7 0.105
Pin 8 0.105
Pin 10 0.000 Beeps all the time
Pin 11 0.491
Pin 12 0.475

[USER="2"]dukefawks[/USER]
